description: standing offer for the provision of all labour, material, tools and equipment for the rental of Chemical Toilets and Hand Wash Stations
full_summary:
=====================================

# Request for Standing Offer (R0128) - Chemical Toilet Rental

## Contract Details

* Reference Number: WS4426636260
* Publication Date: February 22, 2024
* Closing Date: March 11, 2024 at 2:00 p.m. ET
* Contractor ID Number: 12-T12345678-90123456

## Notice Information

* Document title: Portable Toilet Rental Service
* Procurement category: Service Supply (SRV)

## Tender Description

We are soliciting a Request for Standing Offer (R0128) from qualified suppliers for the provision of portable toilet rental services for the Department of National Defence, located in 5 Canadian Division Support Base (5 CDSB) Gagetown, Ranges and Training area in New Brunswick and Various locations in Prince Edward Island. 

The contract period is four years, commencing on April 1, 2024, with two one-year option periods. The contractor will be responsible for supplying all labour, material, tools, and equipment necessary for the rental of chemical toilets and hand wash stations.

## Requirements

* The successful bidder must meet the qualification criteria outlined in the Request for Standing Offer (R0128).
* The bid must be submitted within the specified deadline.
* The bid must comply with all requirements outlined in the Request for Standing Offer (R0128).
* All requests for debriefings must be made in writing within 15 working days from receipt of notification that the bid was unsuccessful.

## Important Dates

* Tender closing date: March 11, 2024 at 2:00 p.m. ET
* Notice URL: <https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18879054?extsite=MTg4NzkwNTRfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==>

## Contact Information

Gatineau, QC K1A 0S5
